mapper.sql:
where rb.status in (1,2,4,5,6,7,42) and rb.is_autoTender = 0
and rb.BORROWTYPE != 3
AND rb.STATUS IN (1,2)
and rb.BORROWTYPE = #{borrowType}
and rb.BORROWTYPE != 4
and (
(rb.APPRSTATUS > 2) or
(rb.APPRSTATUS = 2 and FROM_UNIXTIME(timing_borrow_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00') >= NOW()) )
and rb.timing_borrow_time is not null and rb.timing_borrow_time != '' and rb.`status` = 1
and rb.`status` = 2
and rb.STATUS in (4,5,42)
and (
(re.`STATUS` = 0 and CURDATE() > FROM_UNIXTIME(re.repayment_time, '%Y-%m-%d')) OR (re.`STATUS` = 1 AND rb.BORROWTYPE in(1,2,4) AND (FROM_UNIXTIME(re.repayment_yestime, '%Y-%m-%d') > FROM_UNIXTIME(re.repayment_time, '%Y-%m-%d'))) ) and rb.id != 18043
and rb.style = #{repayType}
and rb.NAME like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
and rm.USERNAME like CONCAT('%',#{borrowPeople},'%')
and publish_time >= #{beginTime}
and publish_time <= #{endTime}
and CONTRACT_NO like CONCAT('%',#{borrowID},'%')
and rb.is_custody = #{isCustody}

SELECT * FROM ( ( SELECT rb.ID, rm.USERNAME, rb. NAME, rb.ACCOUNT, rb.TIME_LIMIT, CONTRACT_NO, rb.BORROWTYPE, rb.APR, rb. STATUS, rb.ADDTIME, rb.ACCOUNT_YES, rb.STYLE, rb.timing_borrow_time, rb.publish_time, rm.HEADIMG HEADIMG, rb.credit_rating, rb.BID_PASSWORD AS bidPassword, 0 is_Transfer, CASE WHEN (rb.style = 1 OR rb.style = 2) THEN (TIME_LIMIT * 30) ELSE TIME_LIMIT END AS timeLimitOrder, SUCCESS_TIME, ROUND( rb.ACCOUNT_YES / rb.ACCOUNT, 2 ) SCHEDULE, rm.IS_FINANCIAL_USER, rb.AREA_TYPE, rb.AREA_CHANGE_TIME FROM ROCKY_BORROW rb LEFT JOIN ROCKY_MEMBER rm ON rb.USER_ID = rm.ID
AND rb.AREA_TYPE = 1 AND rb.BORROWTYPE = '2' ORDER BY FIELD(rb.STATUS,2,1,4,42,5), CASE WHEN rb.`STATUS` = 2 THEN publish_time WHEN rb.`STATUS` = 1 THEN rb.TIMING_BORROW_TIME END ASC, CASE WHEN rb.`STATUS` > 2 THEN SUCCESS_TIME END DESC ) UNION ALL (select * from ( ( SELECT rb.ID, rm.USERNAME, rb.NAME, rb.ACCOUNT, rb.TIME_LIMIT, CONTRACT_NO, rb.BORROWTYPE, rb.APR, rb.STATUS, rb.ADDTIME, rb.ACCOUNT_YES, rb.STYLE, rb.timing_borrow_time, rb.publish_time, rm.HEADIMG HEADIMG, rb.credit_rating, rb.BID_PASSWORD AS bidPassword, 0 is_Transfer, CASE WHEN (rb.style=1 or rb.style=2) THEN (TIME_LIMIT*30) ELSE TIME_LIMIT END as timeLimitOrder, SUCCESS_TIME, ROUND(rb.ACCOUNT_YES/rb.ACCOUNT,2) SCHEDULE, rm.IS_FINANCIAL_USER, rb.AREA_TYPE, rb.AREA_CHANGE_TIME FROM ROCKY_BORROW rb LEFT JOIN ROCKY_MEMBER rm ON rb.USER_ID = rm.ID LEFT JOIN rocky_b_repaymentrecord re on (rb.id=re.borrow_id and rb.status>=4)
and rb.AREA_TYPE = 0 GROUP BY rb.id )
UNION ALL (SELECT rb.id, rm.USERNAME, rb.TRANSFER_NAME, rb.ACCOUNT_REAL, rb.TIME_LIMIT_REAL, '' CONTRACT_NO, rb.BORROW_TYPE, rb.CUR_APR, rb.STATUS, rb.ADD_TIME, rb.ACCOUNT_YES, rb.BORROW_STYLE, '' timing_borrow_time, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(rb.ADD_TIME) publish_time, rm.HEADIMG HEADIMG, rb.BORROW_CREDIT_RATING, rb.BID_PASSWORD AS bidPassword, 1 isTransfer, rb.TIME_LIMIT, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(SUCCESS_TIME) , ROUND(rb.ACCOUNT_YES/rb.ACCOUNT,2) SCHEDULE, rm.IS_FINANCIAL_USER, null as AREA_TYPE, null as AREA_CHANGE_TIME FROM rocky_b_transfer rb LEFT JOIN rocky_member rm ON rb.user_id = rm.id )
) tt ORDER BY
apr ${orderType},
account ${orderType},
SCHEDULE ${orderType},
case when is_Transfer =0 then case when (style = 4) then TIME_LIMIT/30 ELSE TIME_LIMIT end else case when (style = 4 or style =3 ) then TIME_LIMIT/30 ELSE TIME_LIMIT end end ${orderType},
PUBLISH_TIME ${orderType},
SUCCESS_TIME ${orderType},
SUCCESS_TIME desc,
TIMING_BORROW_TIME asc ,
status asc,field(borrowtype,2,5,1,4,3),
apr desc ,
publish_time asc )) t
